attributes.action: overturn the result of the the Cup Winners Cup Leeds v AC Milan 1973
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Cup Winners' Cup 

Christos Michas was the Greek football ref, convicted of match fixing in the 1970s.

Leeds had goals and several penalty appeals disallowed, a player sent off, and lost 1-0 to a goal scored directly from an indirect free kick. 

Michas was convicted of match fixing in a court in Greece relating to events in the final. 
He was sent to jail, fined by the Greek court, and banned from football for life by UEFA. 
Leeds, were not granted the replay and AC Milan kept the title and trophy by UEFA.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
